mapper.select: SELECT a.TRADE_VOLUME,a.TRAN_NAME, (SELECT a.TRADE_VOLUME FROM wbmp_abs_transinfo a WHERE a.ORG_ID = #{orgId} and a.FLAG = '1' AND DATE_FORMAT(a.DATA_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')) AS count FROM wbmp_abs_transinfo a WHERE a.ORG_ID = #{orgId} and a.TELLER_ID=#{tellerId} and a.FLAG = '4' AND DATE_FORMAT(a.DATA_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY TRADE_VOLUME DESC limit 5
